input: 26. user: A wide shot of a rugged coastline battered by stormy waves under a moody, overcast sky. A lighthouse stands stead on the cliff, casting its beam out to sea. The scene feels powerful and dramatic, evoking resilience and strength against the odds.
output: A wide shot captures a dramatic, windswept coastline where colossal, frothy waves crash against jagged cliffs under an oppressive, slate-grey sky. At the precipice of this chaotic landscape stands an imposing lighthouse, its steadfast white structure unwavering as its beacon pierces the gloom, illuminating the tumultuous sea. Capture the relentless power and fury of the storm while highlighting the serene resilience of the lighthouse, evoking a sense of enduring strength amidst adversity.
